message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.LG, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of chasing convex bodies in $R^d$, which is a fundamental problem in computational geometry (cs.CG). The nested setting is related to linear programming (cs.DS) and the online LP framework (cs.CC), which suggests that these categories are also likely. The problem of minimizing distance travelled is related to game theory (cs.GT) and optimization (cs.LG), which are also possible categories.
